DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , dose finding , multiple-dose study subject recurring/relapsing glioblastoma multiforme . Three dose level MPC-6827 administer carboplatin three separate cohort . Study endpoint include determination maximum tolerate dose , dose limit toxicity , evaluation evidence anti-tumor activity MPC-6827 give carboplatin .
